tutorial: 3. Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage
type: Tutorial Step - Now the Second Condition!

definition.text: Select Add Condition on the situation's menu and paste the code in the Javascript Code node!

paragraphs.text: Label the condition node 24H Not Side and label the situation as Downtrend to keep things tidy!

We could have chosen to write the two conditions in one by using the && operator. After all, we want the Trigger On Event to validate true when both conditions are true, right? I'll tell you why that is not a good idea in the next step!
